title: `cargo test --doc` panics if an empty line is present in a doc comment
body:
```
$ cat src/lib.rs
pub struct S {
    s: String,
}

impl S {
  ///
  /// * `arg` - Blah.
  ///
  ///           Foo.
  ///
  pub fn new(arg: String) -> S {
      S { s: arg }
  }

  pub fn s(&self) -> &str {
      &self.s
  }
}
```
```
$ rustup override set nightly
info: using existing install for 'nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin'
info: override toolchain for '/Users/dwagnerhall/tmp/rustplay' set to 'nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin'

  nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin unchanged - rustc 1.25.0-nightly (61452e506 2018-01-09)
```
